name: Ryan Upchurch
description: '''Ryan Edward Upchurch''' (born May 24, 1991), known as '''Upchurch''', is an American rapper, singer-songwriter, and comedian from [[Cheatham County, Tennessee|Cheatham County]], on the outskirts of [[Nashville, Tennessee|Nashville]]. Upchurch became popular primarily as a comedian, creating videos on various platforms to garner support and fans. He sold merchandise based on his song title "raise hell and eat cornbread". Originally considered a "[[country rap]]per", Ryan Upchurch has diversified into many genres such as rock/metal.
